androidx.compose.material.*.notes: Use BOM-managed Material3 artifacts; remove direct Material2 imports.

TabRow.notes: Material3 splits tab rows; choose variant per design.

ScrollableTabRow.notes: Use Material3 scrollable tab row API.

Tab.notes: Adopt material3 Tab with new parameters.

MaterialTheme.colors.notes: Access Material3 color tokens via colorScheme.

Color(0xFF...).notes: Route colors through theme tokens for dynamic color compatibility.

<n>.dp.notes: Replace magic dp values with shared spacing definitions.
